column6: "Back in Black" Part 3 A sniper's bullet changes everything in Peter Parker's life.  Clad in his black costume, Spider-Man will stop at nothing to find the man who pulled the trigger and, even more important, the man who gave the kill order.  This is Spider-Man at his darkest hour. 32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Ron Garney | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Bill Reinhold
